DOC.brief_title: A PK Safety Study Subjects With Hepatic Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess single-dose pharmacokinetics ( PK ) safety TR-701 free acid ( FA ) subject Moderate Severe hepatic impairment compare match control subject normal hepatic function .
